movies.title: Les couloirs du temps: Les visiteurs II
movies.plot: The sequel to The Visitors reunites us with those lovable ruffians from the French Medieval ages who - through magic - are transported into the present, with often drastic consequences. Godefroy de Montmirail travels to today to recover the missing family jewels and a sacred relic, guarantor of his wife-to-be's fertility. The confrontation between Godefroy's repellent servant Jack the Crack and his descendent, the effete Jacquart, present-day owner of the chateau, further complicates the matter.
movies.simplePlot: Knight Godefroy has to return to our time from 1023 to get back the sacred jewels that Jacquouille has taken to the 20th century.

biography.bio: Christian Clavier was born on May 6, 1952 in Paris, France. He is an actor and writer, known for Les visiteurs (1993), Les visiteurs en Amérique (2001) and Asterix and Obelix vs. Caesar (1999). He was previously married to Marie-Anne Chazel.
biography.name: Christian Clavier

actors.character: Jacquouille la Fripouille / Jacques-Henri Jacquard / Prosper le Purineur / Jacouillet

biography.placeOfBirth: Casablanca, French Protectorate of Morocco [now Morocco]
biography.bio: Jean Reno was born Juan Moreno y Herrera-Jiménez in Casablanca, Morocco, to Spanish parents (from Andalucía) who moved to North Africa to seek work. His father was a linotypist. Reno settled in France at 17. He began studying drama and has credits in French television and theater as well as films. His first two marriages both ended in divorce, and he had two children with each of them. He keeps homes in Paris and Los Angeles.
biography.name: Jean Reno

actors.character: Comte Godefroy de Montmirail, dit Godefroy le Hardi

biography.bio: Muriel Robin was born on August 2, 1955 in Montbrison, Loire, France as Muriel Marie Jeanine Robin. She is an actress and writer, known for L'incroyable anniversaire de Line (2013), Muriel Robin fait son show (2013) and Tous avec Line (2001).
biography.name: Muriel Robin

biography.bio: Marie-Anne Chazel was born on September 19, 1951 in Gap, Hautes-Alpes, France. She is an actress and writer, known for Les visiteurs (1993), Le père Noël est une ordure (1982) and Les bronzés font du ski (1979). She was previously married to Christian Clavier.
biography.name: Marie-Anne Chazel

biography.bio: Jean-Luc Caron is an actor, known for The Fifth Element (1997), La Femme Nikita (1990) and Delicatessen (1991).
biography.name: Jean-Luc Caron

biography.bio: Patrick Burgel was born on September 7, 1946. He was an actor, known for Les couloirs du temps: Les visiteurs II (1998), Les visiteurs (1993) and Betty (1992). He died on June 4, 2012 in Vernon, Eure, France.
biography.name: Patrick Burgel

biography.bio: Eric Averlant is an actor, known for Delicatessen (1991), Le baiser mortel du dragon (2001) and Les visiteurs (1993).
biography.name: Eric Averlant

biography.bio: Armelle was born on July 23, 1969 in France as Armelle Lesniak. She is an actress and writer, known for Amélie (2001), Les couloirs du temps: Les visiteurs II (1998) and Podium (2004).
biography.name: Armelle

biography.bio: Pierre Vial was born in 1928. He is an actor, known for Les visiteurs (1993), Les couloirs du temps: Les visiteurs II (1998) and Sans rires (1990).
biography.name: Pierre Vial

biography.bio: Franck-Olivier Bonnet was born on June 21, 1946 in Tournai, Belgium as Jean-Paul Bonnet. He was an actor, known for Amélie (2001), Quest for Fire (1981) and Angel-A (2005). He died on March 25, 2013 in Paris, France.
biography.name: Franck-Olivier Bonnet

biography.bio: Philippe Morier-Genoud was born on March 2, 1944. He is an actor, known for Au Revoir Les Enfants (1987), Cyrano de Bergerac (1990) and Three Colors: White (1994).
biography.name: Philippe Morier-Genoud

biography.bio: Philippe Nahon was born on December 24, 1938 in Paris, France. He is an actor and producer, known for Irreversible (2002), High Tension (2003) and I Stand Alone (1998). He is married to Elisabeth Weissman.
biography.name: Philippe Nahon

biography.bio: Christian Bujeau is an actor, known for Les visiteurs (1993), Pédale douce (1996) and Les couloirs du temps: Les visiteurs II (1998).
biography.name: Christian Bujeau

biography.bio: Olivier Claverie was born on April 3, 1959 in Melun, Seine-et-Marne, France. He is known for his work on Angel-A (2005), Présumé coupable (2011) and A Perfect Plan (2012).
biography.name: Olivier Claverie

biography.bio: Sister of producer director Igor Sekulic, English and French speaking Olga Sekulic has worked in front of he camera with directors such as Luc Besson opposite John Malkovitch, Jonathan Demme opposite Mark Wahlberg, Jean-Marie Poire opposite Jean Reno, Diane Kurys opposite Vincent Perez etc. She started her acting career on stage in Paris under the direction of Pierre Lami and has always kept her passion for the theater intact, working with the most respected Parisian theater directors such as Alain Sachs. On TV she's landed the main part in the success daily prime time TV soap "Allo T Ou;" (Hello where are you?) on TF1, France number one TV network. The show which has entered its second season is watched daily by 10 to 12 million viewers.
biography.name: Olga Sékulic

filmingLocations.location: Château de Beynac, Beynac, Dordogne, France
